summary: A Christmas Elf accidentally takes off in Santa's sleigh, crash lands in a small town, and loses the magic toy bag. Beethoven must rescue the Elf, recover the bag from greedy crooks, and return the sleigh to Santa in time to save Christmas.
cast: John Cleese|Munro Chambers|Kim Rhodes|Jan Skene|Candace Smith|Robert Picardo|Curtis Armstrong|Kyle Massey|John O'Hurley|Ryan Miller|Shannon Jacques|Tom Arnold|Tamra Ugto|Alan Castanaga|Solmund MacPherson|Kristen Sawatzky|Reena Shah|Rick Skene|John Kassir|Kristen Harris|Kimberly Neufeld|Celina Ross|Sandra Bender|Tristin Tergesen|Conrad Siebert|Howard Rempel|Arne MacPherson|Jon Ted Wynne|Dee Bradley Baker|Tiff Bartel|Joel McGowan|Cindy Myskiw|Dennis Scullard|Ken St. Mars
